Method index

player_to_object(string)
This method turns a players name into an object, using nicknames.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
player_to_object
object player_to_object(string str)
This method turns a players name into an object, using nicknames. Turn a players name (string) into an object, nicknames are handled player_object = player_to_object("antiriad");

Coded by Antiriad, womble on.
